name: Banda Sashank
bio: A B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering student at Vellore Institute of Technology, Chennai.

about.intro: I'm a developer who builds apps that solve everyday problems. I focus on making them work well and also look good.
about.expertise:
Full-Stack Development: I build websites and apps from start to finish. I work on all the parts, from the design users see to the server and database behind it. My main tools are JavaScript (React, Express.js, Node.js), but I also have experience with Python and Spring Boot.

AI & Automation Tools: I love making apps smarter and more helpful. I’ve built tools that can answer questions from a PDF, change audio files into text, and automatically upload videos to YouTube.

Databases & Version Control: I use both SQL (like MySQL) and NoSQL (like MongoDB) for databases. For all my projects, I use Git and GitHub to keep my code organized.

Creative Skills: Besides coding, I also do graphic design and video editing. These skills help me make sure the final app is easy to use and looks great.

Video Editing: After effects (Basics: can adopt to project requirements)
AI tools: I can quickly adapt to new AI tools to use them effectively.

projects.title: Budget Planner
projects.description: A full-stack application with a FastAPI backend and React frontend to securely manage personal finances with user authentication and interactive data visualization.

projects.title: QueryPDF Chatbot
projects.description: A full-stack application allowing users to upload PDF documents and ask questions, receiving instant, AI-generated answers with source citations directly from the text.

projects.title: Audio-to-Text PDF Converter
projects.description: A web application that uses OpenAI's Whisper model to automatically transcribe audio files into text, providing real-time progress updates and a downloadable PDF of the result.

projects.title: YouTube Auto-Uploader
projects.description: A Node.js script that automates scheduling and uploading videos to a YouTube channel by reading all video details and file paths from an Excel spreadsheet.

education.institution: Viswabharathi EM High School, Gudivada, Andhra Pradesh
